name: bronze scrap, post-consumer to generic market for bronze | bronze | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20742/documentation

This activity is linking secondary bronze to the market for primary bronze. This activity is a placeholder. The production volume is set to zero as the activity does not take part into the linking of attributional system models, but it is needed for the consequential system model.

The activity starts with the recepetion of post-consumer material

The activity ends with the virgin material ready for transport
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery
